summary: follower for those who watch KingPinDan on Twitch.com/KingPinDan
descriptionHtml:
This is a small mod for the people who enjoy Dan's content so much that they want him in-game! Warning: He will replace the follower "Jenassa" in the drunken huntsman in Whiterun so if you use her she has a chance of disappearing or turning into one of the bugs below. There are few known problems such as the floating Jenassa head, not being able to talk to him, and him simply not existing in the world. they all have fixes.
 Dan's Channel: Twitch.com/KingPinDan

 Floating head fix: console. click the head, and disable.
 
 Not being able to talk: Get this mod ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/? ) and use the make follower spell.
 
 Non-Existence: console, help "kingpin", enter. Then enter a separate command that is Console, Player.placeatme DANSCODEHERE 1
author: MichealFalcon
